result.name: eastern-channel-cod-2006-07-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
To identify and map spawning aggregations of cod in the eastern English 
Channel and to tag the mature, spawning fish within these aggregations by 
conventional means. In addition, biological sampling was undertaken to 
complement assessment of the aggregations.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
